Saheed Balogun (mgbe ụfọdụ a na-ede ya "Saidi") (amụrụ na Febụwarị 5, 1967) bụ onye amaara na-eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri.

A mụrụ Saheed Balogun na 5th nke Febụwarị, 1967, na Enugu State, South-east Nigeria mana o si Oyo State, Nigeria ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị, sekọndrị na nke elu n'otu n'otu. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Kwara State Polytechnic
Ọ malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 1978, ebe ọ gosipụtara ihe omume telivishọn mbụ ya nke akpọrọ "Youth Today" na NTA.
O mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya nke akpọrọ City Girl n'afọ 1989 mana egosipụtala, mepụta ma duzie ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa tupu mgbe ahụ.
Saheed Balogun lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri onyonyo nollywood, Fathia Balogun mana ọ dị nwute na ha kewara ma gbaa alụkwaghịm
O nwere naanị ụmụ abụọ Khalid na Aliyah Balogun.
